mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM HOSPITAL_MEMBER A ,RESERVATION B WHERE 1=1 AND A.MEMBER_ID = B.HOSPITAL_MEMBER_ID AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{hospitalMemberId} AND B.RESERVE_DATE = PARSEDATETIME(FORMATDATETIME(PARSEDATETIME(#{reserveDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION( RESERVE_NO ,MEMBER_ID ,HOSPITAL_MEMBER_ID ,RESERVE_DATE ,ACCEPT ,SYMPTOM ) VALUES ( NVL((SELECT MAX(CONVERT(RESERVE_NO,INTEGER))+1 FROM RESERVATION), 0) ,#{memberId} ,#{hospitalMemberId} ,PARSEDATETIME(FORMATDATETIME(PARSEDATETIME(#{reserveDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH') ,'' ,#{symptom} )
